name: RUINAE
description:
Run, shoot, slash, and fly to escape the Scrapdome. 

RUINAE was made as part of my high school STEM Capstone project, exploring the possibility of a future game development class. I also attempted to emulate the art process behind Dead Cells with a zero-cost method, with every sprite originally being a 3D model  captured as 2D sprites with an associated heightmap. 

(FYI the player character robot was named Janky during development for no specific reason :) )

CONTROLS

[wasd] - move

[space] - jump

[hold space] - jetpack

[left click] - melee

[x] - shoot

[1/2] - swap gun type 

[shift] - dash
